msg.data:
import java.io.File

import scala.io.Source

import org.apache.spark.SparkConf

import org.apache.spark.SparkContext

import org.apache.spark.SparkContext._

import org.apache.spark.rdd._

import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.{ALS, Rating, MatrixFactorizationModel}

paragraphs.text:
%spark
val train = sc.textFile(new File("data_session_train").toString).map { line =>
  val fields = line.split(" ")
  Rating(fields(1).toInt, fields(2).toInt, 1.0)
}

%spark
val numRatings = train.count()
val numUsers = train.map(_.user).distinct().count()
val numArtirs = train.map(_.product).distinct().count()

println("Got " + numRatings + " views from "
  + numUsers + " users on " + numArtirs + " artists.")

Got 57254 views from 11187 users on 17012 artists.

paragraphs.text:
%spark
val rank = 20
val numIter = 4
val lambda = 0.01
val alpha = 2

val model = ALS.trainImplicit(train, rank, numIter, lambda, alpha)

paragraphs.title: Evaluation
paragraphs.text:
def get_user_data(filename,delimiter,columns,name):
    vec = pd.read_csv(filename, delimiter = delimiter, header = None)
    vec_dict = pd.DataFrame(vec.groupby(columns[0])[columns[1]].apply(list))
    vec_dict.columns=[name]
    return vec_dict

def read_vectors_pq(path, colname):
    try:
        os.remove('sparkPrediction/data/product/_SUCCESS')
    except FileNotFoundError:
        pass

    path = path 
    all_files = glob.glob(os.path.join(path, "*"))
    
    df_from_each_file = (pq.read_table(f).to_pandas() for f in all_files)
    vec   = pd.concat(df_from_each_file, ignore_index=True)
    vec.columns=['user',colname]
    vec.set_index('user', inplace=True)
    return vec

userVectorsFlink = get_user_data('userVector.map',';',[0,1],"userVectorFlink")
userVectorsSpark = read_vectors_pq('sparkPrediction/data/user','userVectorSpark')

itemVectorsFlink = get_user_data('itemVector.map',';',[0,1],"itemVectorFlink")
itemVectorsSpark = read_vectors_pq('sparkPrediction/data/product','itemVectorSpark')

userItemTest2 = get_user_data('data_session_test',' ',[1,2],"userItemTest")
userItemTrain2 = get_user_data('data_session_train',' ',[1,2],"userItemTrain")

userdata = pd.concat([userVectorsFlink,userVectorsSpark,userItemTest2,userItemTrain2],axis=1)
itemdata = pd.concat([itemVectorsFlink,itemVectorsSpark],axis=1)

rec_types = ['Flink','Spark']

paragraphs.title: Active users, items
paragraphs.text:
activeItems=set([x for sublist in userdata["userItemTrain"].dropna() for x in sublist])
itemdata = itemdata[itemdata['item'].isin(activeItems)]
userdata=userdata.dropna(subset=["userItemTrain","userItemTest"])

userdata['user']=userdata.index
itemdata['item']=itemdata.index

for typ in rec_types:
    itemdata['itemVector'+typ] = itemdata['itemVector'+typ].apply(lambda x:np.array(x))
    userdata['userVector'+typ] = userdata['userVector'+typ].apply(lambda x: np.array(x))

print(len(userdata),len(activeItems))

paragraphs.title: Create topK recommendations
Precision + Recall
paragraphs.text:
def prec_recall(data,pred_col,test_col,k):
    data['hit'] = data.apply(lambda x: len(set(x[pred_col][:k]).intersection(set(x[test_col]))),axis=1)
    hit = sum(data['hit'])

    count = sum(data[test_col].apply(lambda x: len(x)))
    recall = hit/float(count)
    precision = hit/(len(data)*k)
    return recall, precision, hit

msg.data:
Flink

Spark

paragraphs.text:
for typ in rec_types:
    recall, precision, hit = prec_recall(userdata,'recommendation'+typ,'userItemTest',k)
    print("%s 
 recall: %f 
 precision: %f 
 hits: %i
"%(typ,recall,precision,hit))

paragraphs.title: NDCG
paragraphs.text:
def explode_df(df,user,list_col,is_ranked=False,names=[0,1,2]):
    new_df_rows = []
    get_rank = lambda i: i+1 if is_ranked else 1
    def get_new_rows(user,item_list):
        new_rows=[]
        for i in range(len(item_list)):
                new_rows.append([user,item_list[i],get_rank(i)])
        return new_rows
    
    for ix in df.index:
        new_rows=get_new_rows(df[user][ix],df[list_col][ix])
        new_df_rows.extend(new_rows)
    return pd.DataFrame(new_df_rows,columns=names)

def ndcg_fast2(test, recommendations, top_k=100):
    
    to_join=test\
        .drop_duplicates(subset=['user','item'])[['user','item','score']]\
        .rename(columns={'score':'score_test'})\
        .set_index(['user','item'])
    recs = recommendations.join(to_join, on=['user','item'], how='inner').copy()
    
    users = set(recommendations['user']) & set(test['user'])
    idcgs = pd.DataFrame({'user':list(users)}).set_index('user').sort_index()
    idcg_map = defaultdict(lambda:0)
    for i in range(1,top_k+1):
        idcg_map[i]=idcg_map[i-1]+1.0/math.log(i+1,2)
    
    idcg_map=dict(idcg_map)
    idcgs['idcg']=test.drop_duplicates(subset=['item','user'])\
            .groupby('user')\
            .size()\
            .map(idcg_map)\
            .fillna(idcg_map[top_k])
    recs['dg']=recs['score_test']/np.log2(recs['rank']+1)
    dcgs = recs.groupby('user')['dg'].sum()
    ndcgs = (dcgs/idcgs['idcg']).fillna(0)
    ndcg = ndcgs.mean()
    return ndcg

userItemReal = explode_df(userdata,'user','userItemTest',is_ranked=False,names=['user', 'item', 'score'])

for typ in rec_types:
    userItemRec = explode_df(userdata,'user','recommendation'+typ,is_ranked=True,names=['user', 'item', 'rank'])
    ndcg = ndcg_fast2(userItemReal, userItemRec, k)
    print("%s \n NDCG: %f"%(typ,ndcg))
